meanings.sent1: The smell of the garbage was so barfy that I had to hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk left a barfy odor in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The barfy color of the old couch made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The barfy taste of the medicine made it hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The barfy texture of the slimy food made me gag.

meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride left me feeling barfy and dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The strong smell of the fish market was so barfy that it made me sick.
meanings.sent3: The barfy motion of the boat on the rough sea made me queasy.
meanings.sent4: The barfy news of the accident made my stomach churn.
meanings.sent5: The barfy sight of the moldy bread made me lose my appetite.

meanings.sent1: After eating the spoiled food, I felt like I might barfy.
meanings.sent2: The bumpy car ride made me barfy all over the backseat.
meanings.sent3: The scary movie made my friend barfy in the popcorn bucket.
meanings.sent4: The roller coaster made some people barfy from the sudden drops.
meanings.sent5: The bad smell from the garbage can made the dog barfy on the carpet.
